participant_1.background:
I had to learn to adapt to a new way of life after my farm was foreclosed.
i paint organic scenes with pretty trees.
I bought myself a new outfit to look nice and attract a potential partner.
I am happy and healthy at my current weight.
I am clumsy, but I make up for it with my cooking skills.

participant_2.background:
I'm a secret fashion designer, who is hiding my passion to my conservative family.
I went to Japan and spent my days trying new foods and exploring the city.
I've never been arrested, but I've had my share of run-ins with the law.
I am trying to improve my relationships with the people I love.
I like listening to the Beatles while I'm walking my dog on the beach.

content.text: Hello! I'm a bit clumsy, but I make up for it with my cooking skills.
Hi there! I like listening to the Beatles while walking my dog on the beach.
Nice! I like the Beatles too. I went to Japan and spent my days trying new foods and exploring the city.
I've never been arrested, but I've had my share of run-ins with the law. What's your favorite food?
I like to cook organic scenes with pretty trees. I bought myself a new outfit to look nice and attract a potential partner.
That's really cool! I'm a secret fashion designer, who is hiding my passion to my conservative family. What's your favorite outfit?
I like to wear a lot of colors, and I love dresses. I'm happy and healthy at my current weight, but I had to learn to adapt to a new way of life after my farm was foreclosed.
Oh no, I'm sorry to hear that! I'm trying to improve my relationships with the people I love, and I'm going to Japan soon to explore new foods.
That's great! I hope you have a good time in Japan. I'm always looking for new ways to improve my life, so I've been trying new hobbies lately.
What hobbies have you been trying? I love trying new things too
